summary:
My first ever mod!
Please let me know how to improve it; I did work hard to fit the lore with how the house looked on both the exterior and interior.
PLEASE ENDORSE IF YOU LIKED IT!   -Gifm
descriptionHtml:
Intro: I worked hard on this, I really just hope you people love it! I put nothing but \"full\" effort into this; honestly I don\'t know how much I can stress that. (Lol) Anyways! TRY IT OUT!
It\'s lore friendly and a cozy home to live in, nothing to crazy, yet given a home feel to any and all players who download! PLEASE DOWNLOAD!
I promise you will not be disappointed! Thank You!
Also tell me what to make next! or how to make this one even better!
 -Gifm
============================================================================================
I worked hard so please endorse! I hope you enjoy!
This is my very first mod ever!
I plan to do more, but let me know of bugs or any other problems!
===========================================================================================_
Location: It has a map marker, but if you want to find it without the map (kinda) it is near Fellglow Keep!
============================================================================================
Installation: Read the Read Me!
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
TELLS ALL!!!!

Uninstall: READ THE READ ME!

It is NMM compatible! So just load it on the NMM mod load order then \"Poof\"!
author: Gifm
